newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Pigeons at Belgian station to get a shock.
newsitem.headline: Pigeons at Belgian station to get a shock.

text.p: Unwanted pigeons at Schaerbeek station in Brussels are in for a nasty shock -- an electric one.
Work has begun on installing electrified steel netting in the station to deter the pigeons from settling in areas where they are not wanted, Belga news agency reported on Saturday.
The birds are not harmed and the technology, imported from France, has the backing of animal rights groups.
